en.format.title: Choose the format of your video
en.length.title: Choose the length of your video
en.details.publishing.title: Where do you intend to publish your video?
en.details.publishing.infotext.before: Select a platform to learn what formats and lengths is ideal
en.details.publishing.infotext.1: For Facebook we recommend square or tall square, up to 60 sec.
en.details.publishing.infotext.2: For YouTube we recommend horizontal, 45-60 sec.
en.details.publishing.infotext.3: For Instagram we recommend square or tall square, 0-30 sec.
en.details.publishing.infotext.4: For Instagram story we recommend vertical, 0-15 sec.
en.details.publishing.infotext.5: For websites we recommend horizontal, 45-60 sec.
en.finished.videos.title: Finished videos
en.my.videos.title: My videos
en.ordering.project.name.tooltip: Name your video. Example: "Fall campaign video 1"
en.ordering.description.tooltip: Example: We want to kick off our fall marketing campaign on Facebook with this video.The video should be eye - catching and fun.
en.ordering.publish.platform.tooltip: Some platforms prefer square videos while others use the more standard 16:9. Let us know where you want to publish the video, and we’ll suggest a suitable format and length.
en.ordering.format.tooltip:
16:9 - The standard video format that you see on ex. Youtube.

9:16 - “Vertical video”, a format optimized to fit a mobile screen.

1:1 - A normal square, perfect for Instagram, but also looks great on Facebook.

5:4 - This format is a bit taller than it is wide, so it is a step towards vertical video without being too drastic.
en.ordering.length.tooltip: Choose the length based on the chosen platform. Shorter is better on Facebook and Instagram, but on your website or Youtube, up to 60 seconds might be needed.
en.ordering.files.order.tooltip: Place your visual content in the right order. Drag, or click arrows, to change the order of your files.
en.ordering.files.clips.tooltip: Drop or upload your visual content into this column. If you want a plain background with text, leave the clips/image box empty. For video: remember to add timestamps so we know what part of the clip you want to use (ie. 00:11-00:25).
en.ordering.files.text.tooltip: Add the text you want in this column. Place it next to the chosen video clip/image.
en.ordering.files.comments.tooltip: Any specific requests for this clip? Add them here!
en.ordering.files.extra.tooltip: Upload extra visual content here, that can be used to pad out your video, if needed.
Upload your visual profile here. This will be used in all of your videos, unless you specify otherwise.
If you are not using a Google font, you can upload your font here. We accept .OTF, .TFF and .FNT files.
en.fileuploading.uploader.modal.title: Choose files to upload
en.fileuploading.uploader.modal.description: Max file size is 700MB. Allowed file types: jpeg, jpg, png, ai, eps, photoshop, tif, tiff, cr2, h.264, h.265, mp4, mpeg, m4v, mts, m2ts, mov, quicktime, mp3, wav, aiff, aif, aifc, aac, m4a, ogg, oga, wma.
